'''Captain Radora''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A Vailian captain and a debtor of [Zamar](/zamar/)'s, Radora refused to pay for the commissioned warship equipment she received. The reason is simple: A gang of pirates operating out of the northern alley in the Berth stole all of her money and left her with just enough to drown her own plight in ale.

}}

## =Quests

=
* [The Shipwright's Plight](/theShipwrightsPlight/): Captain Radora is the debtor, though the quest has a wrinkle.
